experience.title: Computer Lab Assistant
info: Supporting University of Cape Town's faculty members and students in their use of computer software and hardware.
Responding to queries pertaining to the physical condition of laboratory equipment, hardware, software and the printer.

experience.title: Junior DevOps Engineer
info: Collaborated with Technical Director to re-architect SIEM platform for cloud and microservice-based setup using Terraform in AWS.
Supported platform management with AWS Systems Manager, Lambda, EventBridge, and tracked tasks using Jira.
Developed deployment scripts with Bash and Docker-compose, and set up monitoring tools like Netdata and Uptime-Kuma, ensuring alignment with SOC team requirements.
